name: Lagartija
description:
Move your lagartija from side to side using the arrow keys to avoid other lizards.
Eat insects along the way by clicking on them.

Game Progress:
Eat insect to gain experience and increase levels.
Higher levels will unlock new lagartija colors and floor types

Honey Shop:
Find honey drops along the way and exchange them in the Honey Shop for power ups and other game unlockables.

Lagartija Friends:
Once you collect enough honey drops, you can unlock and control some of the lagartija friends, which have different abilities.
-Salamandra: More insects will be around.
-Iguana: Has a tougher skin.
-Gecko: This one will run faster.

Originally designed for for Android, adapted for web:
-Gyroscope to Arrows for movement
-Screen Tap to Mouse Click for eating flies

Some features might not work.

Get the original game in Google Play:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.JLHM.XR.Lagartija

Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/JLHM.XR
